ngiemboon: Pɔ́ giŋe le zà pàb zà pàb páʼ púɔ ngùɔ pie pɔ́ jÿɔ́g cúa páb la!
en: They walk “zà pàb zà pàb”  like young girls wearing sandals!
It's past time, don't go anymore.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ńgʉa tsẅɛ, tè kwɔ́ʼɔ zàʼa cʉ̀a.
en: If you go to the field, don't come home late.

ngiemboon: Essé ge náa zèŋe á mbwo gù na guɔ jú yɛ̂.
en: God will give you healing for your illness.
